df-esum
blocks.content: Define a short-hand for the possibly infinite sum over the extended nonnegative reals. ` sum* ` is relying on the properties of the ` tsums ` , developped by Mario Carneiro. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2016.)

blocks.content: An extended sum is a set by definition. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: esumcl
blocks.content: Closure for extended sum in the extended positive reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sseldd(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))))
  tsmscl(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))))
  xrge0base()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ccmn))
  xrge0cmn()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctps))
  xrge0tps()
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))), wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))))
  df-esum(s0, c0, c2)
  xrge0tsmsbi(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))))
  eqid(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))))
  nfan(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  nfel1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfra1(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  r19.21bi(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm esumcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû)))‚Üí sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sseldd(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), (0[[,]]+‚àû), ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))))
  tsmscl((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), (0[[,]]+‚àû), c0, c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))))
  xrge0base()
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))), (‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àà CMnd)
  xrge0cmn()
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))), (‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àà TopSp)
  xrge0tps()
  mpbiri((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))), sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)‚àà((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)), sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)= ‚ãÉ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)))
  df-esum(s0, c0, c2)
  xrge0tsmsbi(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), (‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), c0, c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))))
  eqid((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  fmptdF(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), c0, (0[[,]]+‚àû), c2, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))))
  nfan(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  nfel1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfra1(s0, c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  nfcv(s0, (0[[,]]+‚àû))
  r19.21bi(s0, c0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))), c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: esumeq12dvaf
blocks.content: Equality deduction for extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumeq12dvaf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c2, c3), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), w0)
  unieqd(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), w0)
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), wal(s0, wceq(c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c3)))
  alrimi(s0, w0, wceq(c0, c2))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wceq(c1, c3))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c3))
  mpteq12f(s0, c0, c2, c1, c3)
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  df-esum(s0, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm esumeq12dvaf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)= sum*(s0 ‚àà c2, c3))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 = c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), sum*(s0 ‚àà c2, c3), ‚ãÉ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), ‚ãÉ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)), w0)
  unieqd(((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)), w0)
  oveq2d((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)), ctsu, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3), ‚àÄ(s0, c0 = c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = c3))
  alrimi(s0, w0, c0 = c2)
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, c1 = c3)
  ex(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = c3)
  mpteq12f(s0, c0, c2, c1, c3)
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  df-esum(s0, c2, c3)
}

thm nfesum1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cesum(s0, c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wnfc(s0, cesum(s0, c0, c1)), wnfc(s0, c0))
  nfcxfr(s0, cesum(s0, c0, c1), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  nfuni(s0, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  nfov(s0, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  nfcv(s0, ctsu)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  diff.cxrs.s(s0)
  diff.cress.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.ctsu.s(s0)
}

  diff.cress.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)

}

blocks.name: cbvesum
blocks.content: Change bound variable in an extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvesum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s1, c0, c2), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s1, c0, c2))))
  unieqi(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s1, c0, c2)))
  oveq2i(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s1, c0, c2))
  cbvmptf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  df-esum(s1, c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvesum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)= sum*(s1 ‚àà c0, c2)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), sum*(s1 ‚àà c0, c2), ‚ãÉ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), ‚ãÉ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s1 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)))
  unieqi(((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s1 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)))
  oveq2i((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)), ctsu, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  cbvmptf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  df-esum(s1, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: cbvesumv
blocks.content: Change bound variable in an extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvesumv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  cbvesum(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvesumv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)= sum*(s1 ‚àà c0, c2)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  cbvesum(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}

blocks.name: esumid
blocks.content: Identify the extended sum as any limit points of the infinite sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
} = {
  syl6reqr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), c2, cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), w0)
  xrge0tsmseq(c2, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c3, w0)
  eqid(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: esumgsum
blocks.content: A finite extended sum is the group sum over the extended nonnegative real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumgsum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
} = {
  esumid(s0, c0, c1, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfn, w0)
  tsmsid(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), nat0, c0, cfn, w0)
  xrge0base()
  xrge00()
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ccmn))
  xrge0cmn()
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctps))
  xrge0tps()
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  fndmfifsupp(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), nat0, c0, cxr, w0)
  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fnmptf(s0, c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: esumval
blocks.content: Develop the value of the extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wceq(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cmpt(s0, cv(s1), c1)), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt), cuni(csn(csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt))), w0)
  syl5eq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cuni(csn(csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt))), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), w0)
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  unieqd(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csn(csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt)), w0)
  xrge0tsmsd(s1, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt), c0, c3, w0)
  eqid(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  supeq1d(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt, crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))))), w0)
  rneqd(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2), cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1)))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))), w0)
  eqtr2d(c2, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cmpt(s0, cv(s1), c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1)), cmpt(s0, cv(s1), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1)), cmpt(s0, cv(s1), c1)), wss(cv(s1), c0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wss(cv(s1), c0))
  elpwid(cv(s1), c0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  sseli(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), cpw(c0))
  inss1(cpw(c0), cfn)
  resmptf(s0, cv(s1), c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, cv(s1))
  unisn(csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt))
  supex(crn(cmpt(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c2)), cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  diff.co.s(s1, cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  diff.cxrs.s(s1)
  diff.cress.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.cpnf.s(s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm esumval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)= sup(ran((s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚Ü¶ c2)), ‚Ñù*, <))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)

  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚Üí((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[gsum](s0 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶ c1))= c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {

  syl5eq(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ‚ãÉ { sup(ran((s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚Ü¶ c2)), ‚Ñù*, <)}, ‚ãÉ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), w0)
  df-esum(s0, c0, c1)
  unieqd(((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), { sup(ran((s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚Ü¶ c2)), ‚Ñù*, <)}, w0)
  xrge0tsmsd(s1, (‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), sup(ran((s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚Ü¶ c2)), ‚Ñù*, <), c0, c3, w0)
  eqid((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  fmptdF(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), c0, (0[[,]]+‚àû), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, (0[[,]]+‚àû))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  supeq1d(ran((s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚Ü¶ c2)), cxr, clt, ran((s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚Ü¶((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[gsum]((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)|` s1)))), w0)
  rneqd((s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚Ü¶ c2), (s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚Ü¶((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[gsum]((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)|` s1))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, (P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), c2, ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[gsum]((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)|` s1)), w0)
  eqtr2d(c2, ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[gsum]((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)|` s1)), ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[gsum](s0 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶ c1)), (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)))
  oveq2d((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)), cgsu, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)|` s1), (s0 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶ c1), (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)))
  syl((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)|` s1)=(s0 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶ c1), s1 ‚äÜ c0)
  adantl(w0, s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s1 ‚äÜ c0)
  elpwid(s1, c0, s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))
  sseli(s1, (P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), P(c0))

blocks.name: esumel
blocks.content: The extended sum is a limit point of the corresponding infinite group sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csn(cesum(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), csn(cesum(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  esumcl(s0, c0, c2, c1)
  snidg(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  xrge0tsmsd(hs0, co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, w0)
  eqid(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  esumval(s0, hs0, c0, c1, co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0))), c2, w0)
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cgsu, cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  eqcomd(cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  elpwid(cv(hs0), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  sseldi(cv(hs0), cpw(c0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  inss1(cpw(c0), cfn)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  resmptf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

thm esumf1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, ccom(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c4), cmpt(s1, c2, c3), w0)
  fmptcof2(s1, s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c4, c2, c3, c1, c0, c5, w0)

blocks.name: esumrnmpt

thm esumrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

thm esumsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), co(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxad, cesum(s0, c1, c2))))

} = {

  esumel(s0, c0, c2, universe, w0)

  ssun1(c0, c1)

  esumel(s0, c1, c2, universe, w0)
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c1), cmpt(s0, c1, c2), w0)
  mp1i(w0, wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), c1), cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), wss(c1, cun(c0, c1)))

blocks.content: Extended sum is monotonic. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esummono(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cle, cesum(s0, c2, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  breqtrd(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cle, cesum(s0, c2, c1), co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), w0)
  mpd(w0, wbr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cle, co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1))), wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)))

  elxrge0(cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wi(wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), wbr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cle, co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)))), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxr), wcel(cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1), cxr))
  sseldi(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)

  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), universe), wral(s0, cdif(c2, c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))

  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  esumcl(s0, cdif(c2, c0), universe, c1)

  esumsplit(s0, c0, cdif(c2, c0), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)

blocks.name: esumpad
blocks.content: Extend an extended sum by padding outside with zeroes. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumpad(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), cesum(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c2, nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cesum(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2), cesum(s0, c0, c2), cesum(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c1, c0)), c2), co(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxad, cesum(s0, cdif(c1, c0), c2)), w0)
  esumsplit(s0, c0, cdif(c1, c0), c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, c3))
  elex(c0, c3)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c0)), emptycls))
  disjdif(c0, c1)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  syl6eqel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  0e0iccpnf()
  a1i(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c1, c0)), c2), cesum(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cesum(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c1, c0)), c2), cesum(s0, cun(c0, c1), c2)), wceq(cun(c0, cdif(c1, c0)), cun(c0, c1)))
  undif2(c0, c1)
  esumeq1(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c1, c0)), cun(c0, c1), c2)
  eqtrd(co(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxad, cesum(s0, cdif(c1, c0), c2)), cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxad, nat0), w0)
  oveq2d(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxad, cesum(s0, cdif(c1, c0), c2), nat0, w0)
  eqtrd(cesum(s0, cdif(c1, c0), c2), nat0, cesum(s0, cdif(c1, c0), nat0), w0)
  esumeq2d(s0, cdif(c1, c0), c2, nat0, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  ralrimiva(s0, cdif(c1, c0), w0, wceq(c2, nat0))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c0)), wceq(c2, nat0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  sselda(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c0), c1, w0)
  difssd(c1, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cdif(c1, c0), nat0), nat0), wcel(cdif(c1, c0), universe))
  syl(w0, wcel(cdif(c1, c0), universe), wcel(c1, c4))
  difexg(c1, c4, c0)
  esum0(s0, cdif(c1, c0), universe)
  nfcv(s0, cdif(c1, c0))
  syl(w0, wceq(co(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxad, nat0), cesum(s0, c0, c2)), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxr))
  sseldi(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, c3), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  esumcl(s0, c0, c3, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  xaddid1(cesum(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, cdif(c1, c0))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, c0)

thm esumpad(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum*(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1), c2)= sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))

  undif2(c0, c1)
  esumeq1(s0, (c0 ‚ãÉ(c1 \ c0)), (c0 ‚ãÉ c1), c2)
  eqtrd((sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)[+]sum*(s0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0), c2)), sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), (sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)[+]0), w0)
  oveq2d(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), cxad, sum*(s0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0), c2), nat0, w0)
  eqtrd(sum*(s0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0), c2), nat0, sum*(s0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0), 0), w0)
  esumeq2d(s0, (c1 \ c0), c2, nat0, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  ralrimiva(s0, (c1 \ c0), w0, c2 = 0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0), c2 = 0, s0 ‚àà c1)
  sselda(s0, (c1 \ c0), c1, w0)
  difssd(c1, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, sum*(s0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0), 0)= 0, (c1 \ c0)‚àà ùïå)
  syl(w0, (c1 \ c0)‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà c4)
  difexg(c1, c4, c0)
  esum0(s0, (c1 \ c0), universe)
  nfcv(s0, (c1 \ c0))
  syl(w0, (sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)[+]0)= sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  sseldi(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), cxr, (0[[,]]+‚àû), w0)
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2anc(w0, sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), c0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  esumcl(s0, c0, c3, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  xaddid1(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, (c1 \ c0))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, c0)

  difssd(c0, c1, w0)
  esumcl(s0, (c0 \ c1), universe, c2)
  nfcv(s0, (c0 \ c1))
  sseldi(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), cxr, (0[[,]]+‚àû), w0)
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2anc(w0, sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), c0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  esumcl(s0, c0, c3, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  xrletri3(sum*(s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c1), c2), sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: esumadd
blocks.content: Addition of infinite sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, co(c1, cxad, c2)), co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  esumid(s0, c0, co(c1, cxad, c2), co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, c0, c2)), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(co(c1, cxad, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ge0xaddcl(c1, c2)

  tsmsadd(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c0, c3, w0)
  xrge0base()
  xrge0plusg()
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ccmn))
  xrge0cmn()
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctmd))
  xrge0tmd()
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  esumel(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  esumel(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cxad), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cxad, c2)), w0)
  offval2(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, c1, c2, c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cxad.s(s0)

  sseldi(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, c3), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))

blocks.name: esumlub
blocks.content: The extended sum is the lowest upper bound for the partial sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: esumaddf
blocks.content: Addition of infinite sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumaddf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, co(c1, cxad, c2)), co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  esumid(s0, c0, co(c1, cxad, c2), co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, c0, c2)), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(co(c1, cxad, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ge0xaddcl(c1, c2)
  eleqtrd(co(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, c0, c2)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cxad, c2))), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cxad), cmpt(s0, c0, c2))), w0)
  tsmsadd(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cesum(s0, c0, c2), co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c0, c3, w0)
  xrge0base()
  xrge0plusg()
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ccmn))
  xrge0cmn()
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctmd))
  xrge0tmd()
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c1, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  fmptdF(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), c2, w0)
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  esumel(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  esumel(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cxad), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cxad, c2)), w0)
  offval2f(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cxad, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, c1, c2, c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cxad.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm esumaddf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum*(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1[+]c2))=(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)[+]sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  esumid(s0, c0, (c1[+]c2), (sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)[+]sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)), c3, w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), (c1[+]c2)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), c1 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), c2 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  ge0xaddcl(c1, c2)
  eleqtrd((sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)[+]sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)), ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1[+]c2))), ((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))[tsums]((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[oF(+)](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2))), w0)
  tsmsadd(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), cxad, sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), (‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), (0[[,]]+‚àû), c0, c3, w0)
  xrge0base()
  xrge0plusg()
  a1i(w0, (‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àà CMnd)
  xrge0cmn()
  a1i(w0, (‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû))‚àà TopMnd)
  xrge0tmd()
  fmptdF(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), c0, (0[[,]]+‚àû), c1, w0)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  fmptdF(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), c0, (0[[,]]+‚àû), c2, w0)
  nfcv(s0, (0[[,]]+‚àû))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  esumel(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  esumel(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  oveq2d((‚Ñù*[|`s](0[[,]]+‚àû)), ctsu, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[oF(+)](s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1[+]c2)), w0)
  offval2f(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), cxad, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), c0, c1, c2, c3, (0[[,]]+‚àû), (0[[,]]+‚àû), w0)
  eqidd((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), w0)
  eqidd((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cxad.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: esumlef
blocks.content: If all of the terms of an extended sums compare, so do the sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumlef(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cle, cesum(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

blocks.name: esumsnf
blocks.content: The extended sum of a singleton is the term. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Jan-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 2-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: esumsn
blocks.content: The extended sum of a singleton is the term. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Jan-2017.) (Shortened by Thierry Arnoux, 2-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, csn(c0), c1), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, csn(c0), c1), c2)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  esumsnf(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}

} = {

  esumsnf(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}

  3eqtrd(cesum(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, cxad, c4), cesum(s0, cun(csn(c0), csn(c1)), c2), co(cesum(s0, csn(c0), c2), cxad, cesum(s0, csn(c1), c2)), w0)

  elsni(cv(s0), c0)

blocks.content: Extended sum over a pair, with a relaxed condition compared to ~ esumpr . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Jan-2017.)

thm esumpr2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, cxad, c4)))

  syl5req(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c0), cpr(c0, c0), wceq(c0, c1))
  dfsn2(c0)

  esumeq1(s0, cpr(c0, c1), csn(c0), c2)

  jaoi(wceq(c3, nat0), wceq(c3, cpnf), wceq(co(c3, cxad, c3), c3))
  eqtrd(co(c3, cxad, c3), c3, co(c3, cxad, nat0), wceq(c3, nat0))
  oveq2(c3, nat0, c3, cxad)
  syl(wceq(c3, nat0), wceq(co(c3, cxad, nat0), c3), wcel(c3, cxr))
  mpbiri(wceq(c3, nat0), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  eleq1(c3, nat0, cxr)
  xaddid1(c3)
  3eqtr4d(co(c3, cxad, c3), c3, co(c3, cxad, cpnf), cpnf, wceq(c3, cpnf))
  syl2anc(wceq(c3, cpnf), wceq(co(c3, cxad, cpnf), cpnf), wcel(c3, cxr), wne(c3, cmnf))
  mpbiri(wceq(c3, cpnf), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  eleq1(c3, cpnf, cxr)
  mpbiri(wceq(c3, cpnf), wne(c3, cmnf), wne(cpnf, cmnf))
  pnfnemnf()
  neeq1(c3, cpnf, cmnf)
  xaddpnf1(c3)
  oveq2(c3, cpnf, c3, cxad)
  id(wceq(c3, cpnf))
  oveq2d(c3, cxad, c3, c4, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  eqtr3d(c3, c4, cesum(s0, csn(c1), c2), wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  esumsn(s0, c1, c2, c3, c6, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(c2, c3), w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  simpll(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1))

  simpr(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  biimprd(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq2(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c6))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cesum(s0, csn(c1), c2), c4))
  esumsn(s0, c1, c2, c4, c6, w0)
  esumpr(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, wa(w0, wne(c0, c1)))

  adantlr(w0, wne(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c4))

  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c1), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c1), wcel(c4, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wne(c0, c1))

thm esumpr2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum*(s0 ‚àà { c0, c1 }, c2)=(c3[+]c4))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c0)‚Üí c2 = c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 = c1 ‚Üí(c3 = 0 ‚à® c3 = +‚àû)))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)

} = {

  mpbiri(c3 = 0, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)

  eleq1(c3, nat0, cxr)
  xaddid1(c3)
  3eqtr4d((c3[+]c3), c3, (c3[+]+‚àû), cpnf, c3 = +‚àû)
  syl2anc(c3 = +‚àû, (c3[+]+‚àû)= +‚àû, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c3 ‚â† -‚àû)
  mpbiri(c3 = +‚àû, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, +‚àû ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  pnfxr()
  eleq1(c3, cpnf, cxr)
  mpbiri(c3 = +‚àû, c3 ‚â† -‚àû, +‚àû ‚â† -‚àû)

blocks.name: esumrnmpt2
blocks.content: Rewrite an extended sum into a sum on the range of a mapping function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-May-2020.)

thm esumrnmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), c2), cesum(s1, c0, c3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wceq(c3, nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s1, c0, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

  3eqtr4d(cesum(s0, cun(crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c1))), c2), cesum(s1, cun(crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls)))), c3), co(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), c2), cxad, cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c1)), c2)), co(cesum(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c3), cxad, cesum(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c3)), w0)
  3eqtr4d(co(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), c2), cxad, cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c1)), c2)), co(cesum(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c3), cxad, cesum(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c3)), cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c1)), c2), cesum(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c3), w0)
  eqtrd(co(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), c2), cxad, cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c1)), c2)), cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c1)), c2), co(nat0, cxad, cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c1)), c2)), w0)
  oveq1d(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), c2), cxad, cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), c1)), c2), nat0, w0)
  mpbird(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), c2), nat0), wa(wbr(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), c2), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), c2))))
  jca(w0, wbr(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), c2), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), c2)))

  breqtrd(cesum(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls)), c1)), c2), cle, nat0, cesum(s0, csn(emptycls), c2), wa(w0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(c1, emptycls))))

blocks.name: esumfzf
blocks.content: Formulating a partial extended sum over integers using the recursive sequence builder. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: esumfsup
blocks.content: Formulating an extended sum over integers using the recursive sequence builder. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Oct-2017.)

thm esumss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c2, c1)))

  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0))), wceq(c1, nat0))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c2, c1), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), cuni(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))), w0)
  unieqd(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c1)), w0)
  eqtr3d(co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c1)), co(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0)), w0)
  oveq2d(co(cxrs, cress, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), ctsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wss(c0, c2))
  resmptf(s0, c0, c2, c1)

blocks.name: esumpinfval
blocks.content: The value of the extended sum of nonnegative terms, with at least one infinite term. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumpinfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cpnf))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylc(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cpnf), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxr), wbr(cpnf, cle, cesum(s0, c0, c1)))
  sseldi(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  esumcl(s0, c0, c2, c1)
  eqbrtrrd(cpnf, cle, cesum(s0, c0, c1), cesum(s0, c0, cif(cpnf, nat0, wceq(c1, cpnf))), w0)

blocks.name: esumpmono

blocks.name: esumcvg
blocks.content: The sequence of partial sums of an extended sum converges to the whole sum. cf. ~ fsumcvg2 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Sep-2017.)

thm esumcvgsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, cn, c0), csu(s0, cn, c0)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cli, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  esumpcvgval(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, w0)

  mpteq2dva(hs0, cn, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), c0), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cv(hs0)), w0)

  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat1)))

  sseqtri(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cr, co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf))
  mp4an(wss(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, nat0), wbr(cpnf, cle, cpnf))
  mnfxr()
  ax-mp(wbr(cmnf, clt, nat0), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  mnflt(nat0)
  ax-mp(wbr(cpnf, cle, cpnf), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  pnfge(cpnf)
  icossioo(cmnf, cpnf, nat0, cpnf)
  ioomax()
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  elfznn(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(hs0, cn, cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cv(hs0))), cdm(cli), cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), w0)
  mpbi(wceq(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cmpt(hs0, cn, cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cv(hs0)))), wfn(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cn))
  mpbir(wfn(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cn), wfn(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cseq(nat1, caddc, c2), cfv(cuz, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cz))
  1z()
  seqfn(nat1, caddc, c2)

  fneq2(cn, cfv(cuz, nat1), cseq(nat1, caddc, c2))

  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

thm esumsup(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum*(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c0)= sup(ran((s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ sum*(s0 ‚àà(1[...]s1), c0))), ‚Ñù*, <))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)

  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí sum*(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c0)= sup(ran((s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ sum*(s0 ‚àà(1[...]s1), c0))), ‚Ñù*, <)), (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû)))

  eqtr4d(seq(1(+,(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ c0))), (s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ sum*(s0 ‚àà(1[...]s1), c0)), (s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶(seq(1(+,(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ c0)))` s1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, seq(1(+,(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ c0)))=(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶(seq(1(+,(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ c0)))` s1)))
  mpbi(seq(1(+,(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ c0)))=(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶(seq(1(+,(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ c0)))` s1)), seq(1(+,(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ c0)))[Fn]‚Ñï)
  mpbir(seq(1(+,(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ c0)))[Fn]‚Ñï, seq(1(+,(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ c0)))[Fn](‚Ñ§‚â• ` 1))

  supxrleub(hs0, crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cesum(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), c0))), c1)

  biimpi(hs0 ‚àà ran((s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ sum*(s0 ‚àà(1[...]s1), c0))), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, hs0 = sum*(s0 ‚àà(1[...]s1), c0)))
  elrnmpti(s1, hs0, (s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ sum*(s0 ‚àà(1[...]s1), c0)), cn, sum*(s0 ‚àà(1[...]s1), c0))

blocks.name: esumcvgre
blocks.content: All terms of a converging extended sum shall be finite. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm esumcvgre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpdan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  r19.21bi(s0, c0, w0, wn(wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  sylibr(w0, wral(s0, c0, wn(wceq(c1, cpnf))), wn(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))))
  pm2.65da(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)), wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cpnf))
  esumpinfval(s0, c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  nfre1(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))
  adantr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)), wcel(c0, c2))
  adantlr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simpr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  neneqd(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cpnf, wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))))
  mpbi(wi(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))), wne(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cpnf)), wi(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))), wne(cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf)), wne(cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, c1)))
  gtned(cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(cesum(s0, c0, c1), clt, cpnf), wcel(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  ltpnf(cesum(s0, c0, c1))
  imbi2i(wa(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))), wne(cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, c1)), wne(cesum(s0, c0, c1), cpnf))
  necom(cpnf, cesum(s0, c0, c1))
  ralnex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cpnf))
  orcanai(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, cpnf), wcel(c1, cr))
  orcomd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, cpnf), wcel(c1, cr))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wo(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wo(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf))
  eliccxr(c1, nat0, cpnf)
  xrge0neqmnf(c1)
  biimpi(wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, cmnf)), wo(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  xrnemnf(c1)
}

thm esumcvgre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)

} = {
  mpdan((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ¬¨ c1 = +‚àû)

  esumpinfval(s0, c0, c1, c2, (w0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = +‚àû)))
  nfan(s0, w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = +‚àû))
  nfre1(s0, c0, c1 = +‚àû)
  adantr(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = +‚àû), c0 ‚àà c2)
  adantlr(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = +‚àû), s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  simpr(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = +‚àû))
  neneqd(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), cpnf, (w0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = +‚àû)))
  mpbi(((w0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = +‚àû))‚Üí sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚â† +‚àû), ((w0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = +‚àû))‚Üí +‚àû ‚â† sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = +‚àû), +‚àû ‚â† sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  gtned(cpnf, sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)[<]+‚àû, sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ltpnf(sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  imbi2i((w0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 = +‚àû)), +‚àû ‚â† sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚â† +‚àû)
  necom(cpnf, sum*(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  ralnex(s0, c0, c1 = +‚àû)
  orcanai((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), c1 = +‚àû, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  orcomd((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), c1 = +‚àû, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  syl((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), (c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚à® c1 = +‚àû), c1 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû))
  syl2anc(c1 ‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), (c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚à® c1 = +‚àû), c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c1 ‚â† -‚àû)
  eliccxr(c1, nat0, cpnf)
  xrge0neqmnf(c1)
  biimpi((c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚â† -‚àû), (c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚à® c1 = +‚àû))
  xrnemnf(c1)
}

blocks.name: esum2dlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ esum2d (finite case). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 17-Sep-2021.)

thm esum2dlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c3)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3))), wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4)))
  findcard2d(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3)), wceq(cesum(s0, cv(hs0), cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3)), wceq(cesum(s0, emptycls, cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, emptycls, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3)), wceq(cesum(s0, cv(hs1), cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, cv(hs1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3)), wceq(cesum(s0, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3)))
  eqeq12d(cesum(s0, cv(hs0), cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3), cesum(s0, emptycls, cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, emptycls, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  esumeq1(s0, cv(hs0), emptycls, cesum(s1, c1, c2))
  esumeq1d(s2, ciun(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3, ciun(s0, emptycls, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  nfv(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  iuneq1(s0, cv(hs0), emptycls, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
  eqeq12d(cesum(s0, cv(hs0), cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3), cesum(s0, cv(hs1), cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, cv(hs1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  esumeq1(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cesum(s1, c1, c2))
  esumeq1d(s2, ciun(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3, ciun(s0, cv(hs1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  nfv(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

blocks.name: esum2d
blocks.content: Write a double extended sum as a sum over a two-dimensional region. Note that ` B ( j ) ` is a function of ` j ` . This can be seen as "slicing" the relation ` A ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm esum2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cesum(s0, c0, cesum(s1, c1, c2)), cesum(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c3)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  -| diffsw(s2, w0)

blocks.name: esumiun
blocks.content: Sum over a nonnecessarily disjoint indexed union. The inequality is strict in the case where the sets B(x) overlap. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
